com.innowhere.jnieasy.core
Class JNIEasy

java.lang.Object
  com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.JNIEasy

public abstract class JNIEasy
extends java.lang.Object

JNIEasy is the core class of the framework and the starting point to get the different managers of the framework.

JNIEasy class is abstract, the method get() returns the singleton object of the internal implementation.

Author:
Jose M. Arranz Santamaria

getFeature

public static java.lang.Object getFeature(java.lang.String name)
Returns the feature value of the specified feature name.

Parameters:
name - feature name to look for
Returns:
the feature value. Null if the specified feature was not defined.

setFeature

public static void setFeature(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.Object value)
Defines the feature name and value.

Current implementation only recognizes:

  • "jnieasy.license.dir" : This feature registers the specified directory path where JNIEasy will try to load the license file (JNIEasy.lic) and overwrites any other form of specifying this property.
  • "java.library.path" : Tell JNIEasy to ignore System.getProperty("java.library.path") to get the paths used to search and load native libraries on runtime. This property is used only by JNIEasy and doesn't change the system property. Use the same format used to define the -Djava.library.path property on command line (File.pathSeparator may be useful).

Parameters:
name - feature name to register
value - feature value to register

getVersion

public abstract int[] getVersion()
Returns the current version of the framework using an array of 4 integers: element with index 0 is the main version and following elements (1,2,3) are minor versions.

Returns:
the current version

load

public abstract void load()
Loads the framework. Loading is necessary before executing native operations.

Returns true if the framework is loaded.

Returns:
true if the framework is loaded.
